title: Restaurant Scenes (Person of Interest)(1 X 5)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment:
I love the line "interrogation techniques"
The hole in that story was that the judge and the boy would not be happy at the end of the episode because their maid was dead.   There were two deaths in their household in a short period of time.   The boy might grow up being reluctant to have relationships for fear of losing someone again.
Slowly but surely, Finch and Reese start opening up to each other...
I love season 1, Finch and Reese's conversation are very amusing.
Every now and then I have to pull up to this scene. Love the subtlety and the music.
description: The two scenes where John and Harold go to a restaurant to discuss a number in episode five. It nicely shows how John and Harold are progressively becoming closer, from colleagues to friends.
